ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 1 Date: Tue, 30 Nov 1999 08:42:37 -0600 From: PHAEDRA WHITLOCK  Subject: Re: staff of observers ... Yes, I did aviaks
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 1
Date: Tue, 30 Nov 1999 08:42:37 -0600
From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
Subject: Re: staff of observers

>Im here. Fighting my way out of Lvl 21. Or trying to... So few good >places
>to
>hunt, so few people to group with. *sighs*

Yes, I did aviaks around that time too. Highhold is a good suggestion. For
some of the more mature servers, these spots aren't as camped as they were
before.

If you are brave, you might start trying Cazic. You'll spend a few days
getting used to the MoBs trains there...but you will be speedily getting xp
through level 30+ over there. My xp was crawling when I was getting Aviaks
through level 23...I headed to Cazic and in one night I almost got 2 levels.
21 might be a bit low, but I've definitely seen people there at that
level.

>Im on 3 wizard lists, cant tell them apart honestly.

The Graffe site message board is pretty interesting...loads of info on how
to people have been doing quests and such. I guess a lot of wizzies are
spending time there...too bad it loads like a slug. :) (www.graffe.com)

-- Lim'Dul
